column4: I had the honor of visiting America Knits in Swainsboro. When COVID-19 first hit and PPE supplies were short, they helped the Presidential Task Force make masks and gowns for our medical professionals. Thank you to the whole team for your service to our nation! https://t.co/zEWCZk4GAN
